column4: how do i get the uid of a mount point? i want to manually add it to fstab so it automounts
i'll give it a go, ni1s, ty
vol_id -u /dev/sda1 -> gives UUID, or ‘blkid' see ... also http://www.google.nl/search?q=ubuntu+UUID+fstab&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=com.ubuntu:en-US:official&client=firefox-a
